participant_1.background:
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
I have a close relationship with my mother.
i have long red hair.
I brush my teeth and get ready for work while my kids get dressed for school.
I like to read the news and write my own stories.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
i like to eat.
I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains.
I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve.
i have a missing pinky toe.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy hiking and listening to the Beatles.
I love all of their songs, but I'd have to say Hey Jude is my favorite.
That's a great song! I love the music video for it.
Me too! It's so creative and fun.
I'm a big fan of the Red Hot Chili Peppers. Have you ever heard of them?
Yes, I've heard of them. They're a great band!
My dad loved them. I always listen to their music to remember him.
That's so sweet. I'm sure he would be proud of you.
Thanks. I like to think so too.
What do you do for work?
I'm a writer. I write short stories and novels.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a writer.
It's a lot of fun, but it's also a lot of work.
I'm sure it is. But it's worth it if you love it.
